name: Might and Magic: Book One - Secret of the Inner Sanctum
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from GOG.
notes: A ROSTER.DTA file is needed to start the game, but the GOG installer doesn't seem to create one.  This script creates a blank one just so the game works.
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://lutris.net/files/tools/innoextract.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxMM1.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosboxMM1_single.conf
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosboxMM1.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxMM1.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxMM1.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: overlay
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxMM1.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxMM1.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: 1920x1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxMM1.conf
    key: midiconfig
    section: midi
    value: '128:0'
- write_file:
    content: ''
    file: $GAMEDIR/ROSTER.DTA
main_file: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX/dosboxMM1_single.conf
